Package de.aicard.domains.learnset

Class CardList

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.domains.learnset.CardList
public class CardList
extends java.lang.Object
Provides CardList with Cards and a Pointer to the current ListIndex
Author:
Martin Kuehlborn, Clemens Berger

    • getCardByIndex

      public Card getCardByIndex​(int _index) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.Exception
      Method to get a Card from the list by index
      Parameters:
      _index - expects index of the required Card in the list
      Returns:
      Card from list
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException
      java.lang.Exception - if index is too big or small to be a ListIndex
